string-array.item: The Palais Garnier which locates in Paris was built from 1861 for the Paris Opera.

Founded in 1997 Imbizo Shisanyama Busy Corner is South Africa’s most acclaimed African cuisine restaurant that celebrates the authentic African culture and heritage. At Imbizo Shisanyama Busy Corner you will have the opportunity to enjoy Africa’s Ultimate Braai Experience, at a restaurant that has earned an enviable reputation over the past 18 years for its delicious authentic African cuisine, quality service and a culture that emanates the true African identity.
